OrgName.entry: BALLROOM, SEQUENCE AND LATIN AMERICAN DANCING

Desc.entry: Teaches ballroom, sequence, salsa and Latin American dancing. Partner preferred but can be arranged.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Tues (ballroom, Latin American and salsa, please ring for times)

ProvisionPlace.entry: St Peters and St Oswalds Church Hall

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon, Wed, Thurs (ballroom, Latin American and salsa, please ring for times); Fri at 6.30pm (sequence beginners), 7.15pm (sequence intermediates), 7.45pm (sequence advanced)
